name: Kiss Data - A data visualization design system
description:
这个组件库是360大数据设计团队创建的，组件库中包含常规的组件（Component）例如按钮，表格，表单元素，提示，头像等18个组件用于日常的业务设计工作。

该组件库亦包含数据可视化的组件系统，支持轴组排布，图表组件自定义，普适性的图表组件如柱状图，饼图，折线图，环形图，地图，指标卡以及复杂图表如桑基图和和弦图。


This component library was created by the 360 big data design team. The library contains 18 components such as buttons, tables, form elements, tooltips, and avatars for daily business design work.

The component library also includes a data visualization component system, supporting axis group arrangement, chart component customization, general chart components such as bar charts, pie charts, line charts, ring charts, maps, indicator numbers, and complex charts such as sankey diagram and chord diagram.
